wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Din dipapá lá ɓeɓola di telamɛ bupisanɛ tema ya wonja [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.fr Bola – Jabanɛ o yen ebeyedi 3.0].
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: ó ɓambɛ, jabanɛ na ɓola yen ebolo
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: O aŋgamɛ ó ɓola ɓobia ɓwá ɓwám ó nyóla muɓoledi, ɓola tiŋga di malɛ o wonja na láŋgwa ká ɓetukwɛdi be poŋgɔɓɛ. O ena ó ɓola nika na miano mi ɗoŋgamɛnɛ, nde tɔ mbadi ni pɛpɛ nyena muɓoledi a ma suwɛlɛ nɔ oa tɔ jemea eɓoledi ó ma bola nɔ.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Lo tuko tɛ, toŋgilan, tɔsɔ lo tɛmɛ o nyola ben ɓeɓoledi, lo aŋgamɛnɛ o jaɓanɛ maɓola ma anyu o [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses wonja pɔɔ tɔ ɓowɔn ɓwa nin wonja] tɔ nin nja mbalɛ.
